item.title: Why Everyoneâ€™s Talking About DeepSeek?
item.description: Over the last few weeks, one name has kept popping up across AI forums, Twitter feeds, and GitHub discussions: DeepSeek. Whether it’s about their models, benchmarks, or training philosophy, there’s been a noticeable shift in attention toward this new but fast-rising player in the open-source LLM space. But beyond the hype and headlines, what actually makes DeepSeek stand out in an increasingly crowded field?
